home.subtitle: Mountain Mobility Specialist
home.title: A fleet adapted to <1>YOUR</1> needs
home.description: No imposed standard models. Whether you are in a resort, in the valley, a professional or an individual, we configure the bike that exactly corresponds to your usage and your elevation.
home.pillars_subtitle: ACS supports you all year round, whether you are a family, a craftsman, a seasonal worker or a company.
home.card_bikes_desc: From daily commuting to intensive professional use:
home.card_workshop_desc: Our mobile workshop moves directly <1>to you</1> or to your <3>workplace</3> for maintenance and repair.
home.card_workshop_benefits: Time saving • Usage continuity • Operational bike
home.card_global_desc: We sell much more than a bike. We manage your mobility from A to Z:
home.card_global_list: Rental (short, medium, long term), Sales, Support, Maintenance.
home.card_global_quote: "You ride, we take care of the rest."
home.packs_title: Never be alone facing the mountain
home.packs_desc: Because the weather and terrain in Haute Tarentaise are unforgiving, we have designed packs to secure your journeys, all year round.
home.pack_winter_desc: Studded tires, reinforced lighting, battery thermal protection.
home.pack_security_desc: Certified locks, insurance, integrated GPS trackers.
home.pack_maintenance_desc: We anticipate wear to avoid breakdowns. Fast assistance included.
home.packs_image_quote: "ACS is a bike adapted to your usage, to the mountain, all year round."
home.about_title: More than a provider, a local partner.
home.about_desc_1: ACS was born from a conviction: mobility in the mountains should not be a constraint. Based in Bourg-Saint-Maurice, we know your roads, your schedules and your real needs.
home.about_desc_2: We don't just deliver bikes, we create solutions so that you can move freely, summer and winter.

404.title: Oops, you derailed!
404.description: It seems the chain has slipped. This page is not found or has been moved to another pass.
